title: Binding redirect Tasks.Extensions 4.2.0.1
body:
Update the binding redirect for System.Threading.Tasks.Extensions to match the version we currently ship (4.2.0.1).

I also audited all other System.* assemblies we ship and this was the only mismatch.

commit.message:
Binding redirect Tasks.Extensions 4.2.0.1

Update the binding redirect for System.Threading.Tasks.Extensions to match the version we currently ship (4.2.0.1).

I also audited all other System.* assemblies we ship and this was the only mismatch.

nodes.body: @rainersigwald what's the best way to track that when this lands in dev17? AzDO issue?
No actual good way, but if you file an AzDO issue I can make sure to associate it with the insertion that carries this.
